5023/*
5024 * proto_config - configure the protocol module
5025 */
5026void
5027proto_config(
5028 int item,
5029 u_long value,
5030 double dvalue,
5031 sockaddr_u *svalue
5032 )
5033{
5034 /*
5035 * Figure out what he wants to change, then do it
5036 */
5037 DPRINTF(2, ("proto_config: code %d value %lu dvalue %lf\n",
5038 item, value, dvalue));
5039
5040 switch (item) {
5041
5042 /*
5043 * enable and disable commands - arguments are Boolean.
5044 */
5045 case PROTO_AUTHENTICATE: /* authentication (auth) */
5046 sys_authenticate = value;
5047 break;
5048
5049 case PROTO_BROADCLIENT: /* broadcast client (bclient) */
5050 sys_bclient = (int)value;
5051 if (sys_bclient == 0)
5052 io_unsetbclient();
5053 else
5054 io_setbclient();
5055 break;
5056
5057#ifdef REFCLOCK
5058 case PROTO_CAL: /* refclock calibrate (calibrate) */
5059 cal_enable = value;
5060 break;
5061#endif /* REFCLOCK */
5062
5063 case PROTO_KERNEL: /* kernel discipline (kernel) */
5064 select_loop(value);
5065 break;
5066
5067 case PROTO_MONITOR: /* monitoring (monitor) */
5068 if (value)
5069 mon_start(MON_ON);
5070 else {
5071 mon_stop(MON_ON);
5072 if (mon_enabled)
5073 msyslog(LOG_WARNING,
5074 "restrict: 'monitor' cannot be disabled while 'limited' is enabled");
5075 }
5076 break;
5077
5078 case PROTO_NTP: /* NTP discipline (ntp) */
5079 ntp_enable = value;
5080 break;
5081
5082 case PROTO_MODE7: /* mode7 management (ntpdc) */
5083 ntp_mode7 = value;
5084 break;
5085
5086 case PROTO_PPS: /* PPS discipline (pps) */
5087 hardpps_enable = value;
5088 break;
5089
5090 case PROTO_FILEGEN: /* statistics (stats) */
5091 stats_control = value;
5092 break;
5093
5094 /*
5095 * tos command - arguments are double, sometimes cast to int
5096 */
5097
5098 case PROTO_BCPOLLBSTEP: /* Broadcast Poll Backstep gate (bcpollbstep) */
5099 sys_bcpollbstep = (u_char)dvalue;
5100 break;
5101
5102 case PROTO_BEACON: /* manycast beacon (beacon) */
5103 sys_beacon = (int)dvalue;
5104 break;
5105
5106 case PROTO_BROADDELAY: /* default broadcast delay (bdelay) */
5107 sys_bdelay = (dvalue ? dvalue : BDELAY_DEFAULT);
5108 break;
5109
5110 case PROTO_CEILING: /* stratum ceiling (ceiling) */
5111 sys_ceiling = (int)dvalue;
5112 break;
5113
5114 case PROTO_COHORT: /* cohort switch (cohort) */
5115 sys_cohort = (int)dvalue;
5116 break;
5117
5118 case PROTO_FLOOR: /* stratum floor (floor) */
5119 sys_floor = (int)dvalue;
5120 break;
5121
5122 case PROTO_MAXCLOCK: /* maximum candidates (maxclock) */
5123 sys_maxclock = (int)dvalue;
5124 break;
5125
5126 case PROTO_MAXDIST: /* select threshold (maxdist) */
5127 sys_maxdist = dvalue;
5128 break;
5129
5130 case PROTO_CALLDELAY: /* modem call delay (mdelay) */
5131 break; /* NOT USED */
5132
5133 case PROTO_MINCLOCK: /* minimum candidates (minclock) */
5134 sys_minclock = (int)dvalue;
5135 break;
5136
5137 case PROTO_MINDISP: /* minimum distance (mindist) */
5138 sys_mindisp = dvalue;
5139 break;
5140
5141 case PROTO_MINSANE: /* minimum survivors (minsane) */
5142 sys_minsane = (int)dvalue;
5143 break;
5144
5145 case PROTO_ORPHAN: /* orphan stratum (orphan) */
5146 sys_orphan = (int)dvalue;
5147 break;
5148
5149 case PROTO_ORPHWAIT: /* orphan wait (orphwait) */
5150 orphwait -= sys_orphwait;
5151 sys_orphwait = (int)dvalue;
5152 orphwait += sys_orphwait;
5153 break;
5154
5155 /*
5156 * Miscellaneous commands
5157 */
5158 case PROTO_MULTICAST_ADD: /* add group address */
5159 if (svalue != NULL)
5160 io_multicast_add(svalue);
5161 sys_bclient = 1;
5162 break;
5163
5164 case PROTO_MULTICAST_DEL: /* delete group address */
5165 if (svalue != NULL)
5166 io_multicast_del(svalue);
5167 break;
5168
5169 /*
5170 * Peer_clear Early policy choices
5171 */
5172
5173 case PROTO_PCEDIGEST: /* Digest */
5174 peer_clear_digest_early = value;
5175 break;
5176
5177 /*
5178 * Unpeer Early policy choices
5179 */
5180
5181 case PROTO_UECRYPTO: /* Crypto */
5182 unpeer_crypto_early = value;
5183 break;
5184
5185 case PROTO_UECRYPTONAK: /* Crypto_NAK */
5186 unpeer_crypto_nak_early = value;
5187 break;
5188
5189 case PROTO_UEDIGEST: /* Digest */
5190 unpeer_digest_early = value;
5191 break;
5192
5193 default:
5194 msyslog(LOG_NOTICE,
5195 "proto: unsupported option %d", item);
5196 }
5197}

5217 sys_lamport = 0;
5218 sys_tsrounding = 0;
5219}
